metadata.Title: CVE-2019-25059 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Artifex Ghostscript through 9.26 mishandles .completefont. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2019-3839.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-25059` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ghostscript - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4
ghostscript-x - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4
libgs9 - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4
libgs9-common - 9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> incomplete fix for CVE-2019-6116 and CVE-2019-3839 third commit is probably unnecessary and is not in focal+

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '9.50~dfsg-5ubuntu4').
